actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of political contribution.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of political contribution for purposes of the income tax credit to delete the requirement that such contribution further the candidacy of the recipient.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of political contribution.
